item.title: React Fast Start 101
item.description: New app structure Create a directory with the name of the project and inside we will have front and backend mkdir nameproject cd nameproject mkdir backend npx create-react-app front --template typescript SRC Structure Under src components folder screen folders install ES7 REact Redux plugin vscode ##Â Components rafce to create component .container to create a div with cassname container props to components send with spread operator
